channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14321] branch-1.1 src artifact includes shaded target dirs
item.description:
Fixed the make_rc script, now I find in the src binary.

x hbase-1.1.2/hbase-shaded/hbase-shaded-client/

item.summary: branch-1.1 src artifact includes shaded target dirs

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Invalid. Seems mvn clean assembly:single and an assembly file specified doesn't do the same clean as a simple clean install. Updating patch on HBASE-14318 accordingly.

I hit this while following the ref guide's instructions for building the source assembly:


$ mvn clean install -DskipTests assembly:single -Dassembly.file=hbase-assembly/src/main/assembly/src.xml -Prelease
mind giving the latest patch on HBASE-14318 a spin, Sean Busbey? I can update it to correct the ref guide's instructions too.
